The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 22 November is 1,301,559 (2,312.4 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 17 November, there were 141,577 new confirmed cases (251.5 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 10 November, there were 149,465 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 5% (7,888 fewer cases).
